import{POST_SUB_MODULE_ID,POST_SUB_MODULE_SUCCESS_ID,UPDATE_MODULE,UPDATE_MODULE_SUCCESS,GET_SUB_MODULES,GET_SUB_MODULES_SUCCESS,DELETE_SUB_MODULES_USING_ID_SUCCESS,DELETE_SUB_MODULES_USING_ID,GET_SUB_MODULES_EDIT_DATA_USING_ID,GET_SUB_MODULES_EDIT_DATA_USING_ID_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";/// post api
export var save_H_Sub_Modules=function save_H_Sub_Modules(Data){return{type:POST_SUB_MODULE_ID,Data:Data};};export var SaveSubModuleSuccess=function SaveSubModuleSuccess(saveMessage){return{type:POST_SUB_MODULE_SUCCESS_ID,payload:saveMessage};};/// get api
export var getSubModules=function getSubModules(){return{type:GET_SUB_MODULES};};export var getSubModulesSuccess=function getSubModulesSuccess(data){return{type:GET_SUB_MODULES_SUCCESS,payload:data};};////delete api
export var deleteSubModuleUsingID=function deleteSubModuleUsingID(id){return{type:DELETE_SUB_MODULES_USING_ID,id:id};};export var deleteSubModuleUsingIDSuccess=function deleteSubModuleUsingIDSuccess(data){return{type:DELETE_SUB_MODULES_USING_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};///// edit api
export var GetSubModuleEditDataUsingID=function GetSubModuleEditDataUsingID(id){return{type:GET_SUB_MODULES_EDIT_DATA_USING_ID,id:id};};export var GetSubModuleEditDataUsingIDSuccess=function GetSubModuleEditDataUsingIDSuccess(data){return{type:GET_SUB_MODULES_EDIT_DATA_USING_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};/// update api
export var updateSubModule_UsingID=function updateSubModule_UsingID(updateData,ID){return{type:UPDATE_MODULE,updateData:updateData,ID:ID};};export var updateSubModuleSuccess=function updateSubModuleSuccess(data){return{type:UPDATE_MODULE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
